## defineConfig() function

Sets or replaces the global configuration for Yoot.

**Signature:**

```typescript
defineConfig: (options: YootConfig) => void
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void

## Remarks

To incrementally add or update options, use `mergeConfig`<!-- -->.
